Posts.EditableText:
Does anyone know the status of the Activelit site? I used it successfully a year ago, but now none of my students can login. I can login as an admin & create new users, but no new students (or even former students) can login.

I tried to "sign up" again, but the form submit throws an error and I can't figure out who to contact to see if the site is still up and running. 

Any ideas?
Thanks!
Posts.HTML:
Does anyone know the status of the Activelit site? I used it successfully a year ago, but now none of my students can login. I can login as an admin & create new users, but no new students (or even former students) can login.

I tried to "sign up" again, but the form submit throws an error and I can't figure out who to contact to see if the site is still up and running.

Any ideas?
Thanks!

Posts.EditableText: Activelit should be being maintained by Luis, who is also maintaining this website. He is around, and recently helped me with some Spanish translations for Quest.
Posts.HTML: Activelit should be being maintained by Luis, who is also maintaining this website. He is around, and recently helped me with some Spanish translations for Quest.
